featureDescription.name: canonText
featureDescription.description: Syntactically canonical form of the answer (without leading/trailing interpunction and the- and such)

featureDescription.name: source
featureDescription.description: Source of the candidate answer, either structured/fulltext search of wiki or freebase

featureDescription.name: resources
featureDescription.description: Set of resources corresponding to this answer. (There may be multiple, of course.) Duplicates should not appear, order should not matter.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence of the answer; this is an estimate of the probability that the answer is right

featureDescription.name: features
featureDescription.description: A set of features of this answer, see CandidateAnswerTypes.

featureDescription.name: lats
featureDescription.description: A set of LATs associated with this answer. These are simply LAT annotations copied from the candidate answer CAS.

featureDescription.name: focus
featureDescription.description: The focus portion of the answer; typically a single word like the root noun or such.
